description: The initiative at EAFIT University focuses on enhancing agricultural sectors through a multidisciplinary approach. Established over six years ago, it aims to integrate technology and research into agronomy, fostering sustainable agri-food systems. The university has restructured to address complex regional challenges, emphasizing collaboration with various stakeholders, including the private and public sectors. This initiative not only promotes education and research but also seeks to transform local communities by improving food systems and sustainability practices.
name: EAFIT
